github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text:
Generate a single-line commit message using Conventional Commits format: <type>(scope): <description>

IMPORTANT:
- Generate ONLY a single line, no body, no additional explanations
- Keep total length under 72 characters
- Do NOT include emoji or bullet points
- Do NOT add line breaks or additional description paragraphs

Types: feat, fix, docs, style, refactor, test, chore, perf, ci, build, revert

Scope: Use affected component/library (ng-auth, core, utils, etc.) or omit if workspace-wide

Examples:
- feat(ng-auth): add JWT refresh token support
- fix(core): correct tax calculation rounding
- docs(ng-components): update usage examples
- refactor(utils): simplify date converters
- chore: update dependencies
